verses.verse: And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Noach <S%H5146><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and replenish <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the fear of you <S%H4172><s%> and the dread of you <S%H2844><s%> shall be upon every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and upon every fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, upon all that moveth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%>, and upon all the fishes <S%H1709><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>; into your hand <S%H3027><s%> are they delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

Havahry moving thing <S%H7431><s%> that liveth <S%H2416><s%> shall be meat <S%H402><s%> for you; even as the green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you all things.
But <S%H389><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the life <S%H5315><s%> thereof, which is the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof, shall ye not eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And surely <S%H389><s%> your blood <S%H1818><s%> of your lives <S%H5315><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every beast <S%H2416><s%> will I require it <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>; at the hand <S%H3027><s%> of every man's <S%H376><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.

Whoso sheddeth <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8802><s%> man's <S%H120><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, by man <S%H120><s%> shall his blood <S%H1818><s%> be shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: for in the image <S%H6754><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he man <S%H120><s%>.

And you, be ye fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; bring forth abundantly <S%H8317><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8798><s%> therein.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Noach <S%H5146><s%>, and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
And I, behold, I establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8688><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, and with your seed <S%H2233><s%> after you <S%H310><s%>;

And with every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you, of the fowl <S%H5775><s%>, of the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and of every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> with you; from all that go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you; neither shall all flesh <S%H1320><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8735><s%> any more by the waters <S%H4325><s%> of a flood <S%H3999><s%>; neither shall there any more be a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I <S%H589><s%> make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that is with you, for perpetual <S%H5769><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>:
I do set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my bow <S%H7198><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and it shall be for a token <S%H226><s%> of a covenant <S%H1285><s%> between me and the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when I bring <S%H6049><s%> <S%H8763><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> over the earth <S%H776><s%>, that the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>:

And I will remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which is between me and you and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall no more <S%H5750><s%> become a flood <S%H3999><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And the bow <S%H7198><s%> shall be in the cloud <S%H6051><s%>; and I will look upon it <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that I may remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> between <S%H996><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> and <S%H996><s%> every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Noach <S%H5146><s%>, This is the token <S%H226><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%>, which I have established <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> between me and all flesh <S%H1320><s%> that is upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noach <S%H5146><s%>, that went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%>, were Shem <S%H8035><s%>, and Ham <S%H2526><s%>, and Yefet <S%H3315><s%>: and Ham <S%H2526><s%> <S%H1931><s%> is the father <S%H1><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.
These are the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noach <S%H5146><s%>: and of them was the whole earth <S%H776><s%> overspread <S%H5310><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
And Noach <S%H5146><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to be an husbandman <S%H376><s%> <S%H127><s%>, and he planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>:

And he drank <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the wine <S%H3196><s%>, and was drunken <S%H7937><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and he was uncovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8691><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%>.

And Ham <S%H2526><s%>, the father <S%H1><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> brethren <S%H251><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>.

And Shem <S%H8035><s%> and Yefet <S%H3315><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a garment <S%H8071><s%>, and laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it upon both <S%H8147><s%> their shoulders <S%H7926><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> backward <S%H322><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%>; and their faces <S%H6440><s%> were backward <S%H322><s%>, and they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not their father's <S%H1><s%> nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

And Noach <S%H5146><s%> awoke <S%H3364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from his wine <S%H3196><s%>, and knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what his younger <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Cursed <S%H779><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>; a servant <S%H5650><s%> of servants <S%H5650><s%> shall he be unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>; and Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>.

'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yefet <S%H3315><s%>, and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the tents <S%H168><s%> of Shem <S%H8035><s%>; and Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> shall be his servant <S%H5650><s%>.

And Noach <S%H5146><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the flood <S%H3999><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Noach <S%H5146><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
